generator.group: Centenary Institute of Cancer Medicine and Cell Biology

publications.title: Characterization of the first induced pluripotent stem cell line generated from a patient with autosomal dominant catecholaminergic polymorphic ventricular tachycardia due to a heterozygous mutation in cardiac calsequestrin-2

donor.disease_description: Any catecholaminergic polymorphic ventricular tachycardia in which the cause of the disease is a mutation in the CASQ2 gene.

genomic_modifications.description: Any catecholaminergic polymorphic ventricular tachycardia in which the cause of the disease is a mutation in the CASQ2 gene.

ethics.institutional_HREC: Sydney Local Health District Ethics Review Committee
